about_the_game: The original soundtrack to the award-winning RPG Divinity: Original Sin captures the world of Rivellon in all of its glory. This soundtrack was composed by Kirill Pokrovsky, a long time collaborator and friend of Larian Studios. He was also the composer for the original soundtracks of Divine Divinity, Beyond Divinity, Divinity II: Developer’s Cut and Divinity: Dragon Commander.
